Player History

Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...

Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Diablo on 8/29/1972...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1975, hitting .571 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Catcher in 1975...

Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 8/31/1979...

Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
